postcontent:
The Hammerli 208 International is the legendary champion of rapid fire and competition pistols.  If one wants "Formula 1" race car performance at a reasonable price, rather than a VW Beetle, these are guns to consider.

The "next gen" after the 208 International, with a 2 stage trigger and adjustable trigger shoe position is the 208S, for sale here.  This specific gun also is a commemorative edition, with somewhat better finish and gold lettering.

This is NOT a Sig-Arms import gun which had a safety at the rear of the slide.  Additional magazines and other mass front barrel weights (160-240 grams) are available with purchase (NOT sold separately).

SHIPPING AND FFL transfer available.  For IL FOID holders, transfer on FOID card IS possible, WITH state police confirmation of card validity.  For NH residents, personal transfer with either NH permit and or state residency and confirmed validity of paperwork from your local police department.  Please note, in some localities, this gun may be classified as an assault weapon.  It generally is considered "legal exempt" in CA.  In a few areas and towns, it may be considered an assault weapon.  8 rd magazines are available.

A LEFT HAND target grip is available (illustrated) if needed, and slab type combat grips as used on the 212 can be provided as well.  Grips NOT sold separately.

The 208 probably descended from the Reising Target pistol of the 1920s, via the Walther Olympia.  After WWII, Walther was prohibited from handgun manufacture, and sold the patents to Hammerli, which primarily made reproduction guns and some precision firearms at the time.  A series of improved versions resulted, of which the 208 and 208S, and their economical form, the 215 were the end stages before the company was sold, and plastic versions were offered by Walther and SIG-Arms.

Since the S&W M41 also is a descendent of the Walther Olympia, in essence the 208 is am M41 that Smith and Wesson never made.

The 208 offers adjustable trigger pull, and a frame mounted rear sight that is adjustable for windage and elevation.  The trigger is single stage, and not adjustable for position.  The basic gun (fired from machine rest) is more accurate than even the best S&W M41.  The adjustable trigger pull renders it even better in actual hand-held use.  The adjustable barrel weight allows both refinement of balance of the gun, and use of the precise position of the weight for tuning of the barrel and gun in actual firing.

Standard velocity ammunition only.
